verses.verse: Now Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Bela <S%H1106><s%> his firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, Ashbel <S%H788><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%>, and Aharah <S%H315><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%>,
Nohah <S%H5119><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%>, and Rapha <S%H7498><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bela <S%H1106><s%> were, Addar <S%H146><s%>, and Gera <S%H1617><s%>, and Abihud <S%H31><s%>,
And Abishua <S%H50><s%>, and Naaman <S%H5283><s%>, and Ahoah <S%H265><s%>,
And Gera <S%H1617><s%>, and Shephuphan <S%H8197><s%>, and Huram <S%H2361><s%>.

And these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ehud <S%H261><s%>: these are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Geba <S%H1387><s%>, and they removed <S%H1540><s%> them to Manahath <S%H4506><s%>:
And Naaman <S%H5283><s%>, and Ahiah <S%H281><s%>, and Gera <S%H1617><s%>, he removed <S%H1540><s%> them, and begat <S%H3205><s%> Uzza <S%H5798><s%>, and Ahihud <S%H284><s%>.

And Shaharaim <S%H7842><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> children in the country <S%H7704><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, after <S%H4480><s%> he had sent them away <S%H7971><s%>; Hushim <S%H2366><s%> and Baara <S%H1199><s%> were his wives <S%H802><s%>.
And he begat <S%H3205><s%> of Hodesh <S%H2321><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>, Jobab <S%H3103><s%>, and Zibia <S%H6644><s%>, and Mesha <S%H4331><s%>, and Malcham <S%H4445><s%>,
And Jeuz <S%H3263><s%>, and Shachia <S%H7634><s%>, and Mirma <S%H4821><s%>. These were his sons <S%H1121><s%>, heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>.
And of Hushim <S%H2366><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Abitub <S%H36><s%>, and Elpaal <S%H508><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elpaal <S%H508><s%>; Eber <S%H5677><s%>, and Misham <S%H4936><s%>, and Shamed <S%H8106><s%>, who built <S%H1129><s%> Ono <S%H207><s%>, and Lod <S%H3850><s%>, with the towns <S%H1323><s%> thereof:

Beriah <S%H1283><s%> also, and Shema <S%H8087><s%>, who <S%H1992><s%> were heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Aijalon <S%H357><s%>, who drove away <S%H1272><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gath <S%H1661><s%>:
And Ahio <S%H283><s%>, Shashak <S%H8349><s%>, and Jeremoth <S%H3406><s%>,
And Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%>, and Arad <S%H6166><s%>, and Ader <S%H5738><s%>,
And Michael <S%H4317><s%>, and Ispah <S%H3472><s%>, and Joha <S%H3109><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah <S%H1283><s%>;
And Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%>, and Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>, and Hezeki <S%H2395><s%>, and Heber <S%H2268><s%>,
Ishmerai <S%H3461><s%> also, and Jezliah <S%H3152><s%>, and Jobab <S%H3103><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elpaal <S%H508><s%>;
And Jakim <S%H3356><s%>, and Zichri <S%H2147><s%>, and Zabdi <S%H2067><s%>,
And Elienai <S%H462><s%>, and Zilthai <S%H6769><s%>, and Eliel <S%H447><s%>,
And Adaiah <S%H5718><s%>, and Beraiah <S%H1256><s%>, and Shimrath <S%H8119><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shimhi <S%H8096><s%>;
And Ishpan <S%H3473><s%>, and Heber <S%H5677><s%>, and Eliel <S%H447><s%>,
And Abdon <S%H5658><s%>, and Zichri <S%H2147><s%>, and Hanan <S%H2605><s%>,
And Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, and Elam <S%H5867><s%>, and Antothijah <S%H6070><s%>,
And Iphedeiah <S%H3301><s%>, and Penuel <S%H6439><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shashak <S%H8349><s%>;
And Shamsherai <S%H8125><s%>, and Shehariah <S%H7841><s%>, and Athaliah <S%H6271><s%>,
And Jaresiah <S%H3298><s%>, and Eliah <S%H452><s%>, and Zichri <S%H2147><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham <S%H3395><s%>.
These were heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, chief <S%H7218><s%> men. These dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
And at Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> <S%H25><s%>; whose wife's <S%H802><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Maachah <S%H4601><s%>:
And his firstborn <S%H1060><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> Abdon <S%H5658><s%>, and Zur <S%H6698><s%>, and Kish <S%H7027><s%>, and Baal <S%H1168><s%>, and Nadab <S%H5070><s%>,
And Gedor <S%H1446><s%>, and Ahio <S%H283><s%>, and Zacher <S%H2144><s%>.

And Mikloth <S%H4732><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Shimeah <S%H8039><s%>. And these also <S%H637><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> with their brethren <S%H251><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, over against them <S%H5048><s%>.

Â¶ And Ner <S%H5369><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Kish <S%H7027><s%>, and Kish <S%H7027><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>, and Saul <S%H7586><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%>, and Malchi-shua <S%H4444><s%>, and Abinadab <S%H41><s%>, and Esh-baal <S%H792><s%>.
And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> was Merib-baal <S%H4807><s%>; and Merib-baal <S%H4807><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Micah <S%H4318><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Micah <S%H4318><s%> were, Pithon <S%H6377><s%>, and Melech <S%H4429><s%>, and Tarea <S%H8390><s%>, and Ahaz <S%H271><s%>.

And Ahaz <S%H271><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jehoadah <S%H3085><s%>; and Jehoadah <S%H3085><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Alemeth <S%H5964><s%>, and Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%>, and Zimri <S%H2174><s%>; and Zimri <S%H2174><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Moza <S%H4162><s%>,
And Moza <S%H4162><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Binea <S%H1150><s%>: Rapha <S%H7498><s%> was his son <S%H1121><s%>, Eleasah <S%H501><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Azel <S%H682><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>:

And Azel <S%H682><s%> had six <S%H8337><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, whose names <S%H8034><s%> are these, Azrikam <S%H5840><s%>, Bocheru <S%H1074><s%>, and Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>, and Sheariah <S%H8187><s%>, and Obadiah <S%H5662><s%>, and Hanan <S%H2605><s%>. All these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azel <S%H682><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eshek <S%H6232><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> were, Ulam <S%H198><s%> his firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, Jehush <S%H3266><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%>, and Eliphelet <S%H467><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ulam <S%H198><s%> were mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>, archers <S%H1869><s%> <S%H7198><s%>, and had many <S%H7235><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, and sons' <S%H1121><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>. All these are of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>.
